about_the_game:
Team Five is an online, over-the-top turn-based battle where the clock is always against you!
Battle it out against your friends, each with a team of five animals with special abilities.
Collect all the loot you can, but don't get too greedy because when your five minutes run out - THE WORLD ENDS.



Let loose with a vast arsenal of customizable weapons!
Craft your own arsenal of destruction, upgrading and enhancing your weapons to maximum capacity.
Rain chaos upon the map, obliterating everything in sight, yourself included!



Once you've returned with your spoils, you can meet with the mysterious vendor, the animal that's been through it all.
In return for your collected goods, he's willing to give you his treasures.
Get powerful weapons, new furious animals, and cool gadgets — everything so that your next venture will be even more fruitful.



  • Five Animals: Command your animals to kill and be killed while exploiting their special abilities and playstyles.
  • Five Exits: Collect all the scattered loot, as you compete with your enemy over which animals get to leave the battlezone.
  • Five Minutes: Experience the frantic thrill of a time-limited battle where every decision must be swift and calculated.
  • Intense online multiplayer battles: Challenge your friends or engage in competitive matches with players from around the world.
  • Explosive weaponry: Customize and upgrade your weapons to unleash devastating firepower upon your opponents and the environment.
  • Dynamic maps: Annihilate the map and witness its transformation as you unleash chaos upon it.
  • Unlimited strategies: Discover endless tactical possibilities as you experiment with different animal combinations and strategic approaches.
detailed_description:
Time is running out!


About the Game



Team Five is an online, over-the-top turn-based battle where the clock is always against you!
Battle it out against your friends, each with a team of five animals with special abilities.
Collect all the loot you can, but don't get too greedy because when your five minutes run out - THE WORLD ENDS.



Let loose with a vast arsenal of customizable weapons!
Craft your own arsenal of destruction, upgrading and enhancing your weapons to maximum capacity.
Rain chaos upon the map, obliterating everything in sight, yourself included!



Once you've returned with your spoils, you can meet with the mysterious vendor, the animal that's been through it all.
In return for your collected goods, he's willing to give you his treasures.
Get powerful weapons, new furious animals, and cool gadgets — everything so that your next venture will be even more fruitful.



  • Five Animals: Command your animals to kill and be killed while exploiting their special abilities and playstyles.
  • Five Exits: Collect all the scattered loot, as you compete with your enemy over which animals get to leave the battlezone.
  • Five Minutes: Experience the frantic thrill of a time-limited battle where every decision must be swift and calculated.
  • Intense online multiplayer battles: Challenge your friends or engage in competitive matches with players from around the world.
  • Explosive weaponry: Customize and upgrade your weapons to unleash devastating firepower upon your opponents and the environment.
  • Dynamic maps: Annihilate the map and witness its transformation as you unleash chaos upon it.
  • Unlimited strategies: Discover endless tactical possibilities as you experiment with different animal combinations and strategic approaches.
name: Team Five

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GeForce or 2GB AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: 🐢 Five animals. 🚪 Five exits. ⏳ Five Minutes. Demolish your friends online in a race against the clock. Boost your weapons to the MAX, annihilate the map so even its mother won't recognize it, and GET THE HELL OUT!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
